item.description:
Join us for a multicultural celebration featuring music by Brazilian musician Fernando Holz and stories and poems about family, food, and Portuguese culture from the Portuguese-American writers group Kale Soup for the Soul.
Junte-se a nós para uma noite maravilhosa e multicultural com música
pelo músico brasileiro, Fernando Holz, e histórias e poesia sobre
família, comida, e cultura portuguesa pelo grupo luso-americano, Kale Soup for the Soul.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: 28th Annual Rogers Celebration of Portuguese-Speaking People and Their Cultures
